General.Name: Fintec Global Bhd
General.Description: Fintec Global Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as a technology incubator for the renewable energy, engineering, financial application technology, multimedia solutions, food and beverage, healthcare, information technology, and agriculture industries in Malaysia. It operates through five segments: Technology Incubation, Portfolio Investment, Biotechnology Products, Financial Services, and Glove Business. The company provides management and strategic advisory services; research, development, and commercialization of agriculture and farming technologies; research related services; and business networking and funding services to incubatee companies. It also invests and trades in quoted and unquoted securities. In addition, the company manufactures and trades in agricultural related products; manufactures peeled lumber; and supplies solar photovoltaic energy, as well as operates as a contractor for biomass technologies, as well as leases rubber gloves machinery and ancillary equipment. Further, it engages in the invests in food and beverages, lifestyle, and entertainment businesses; rubber gloves machinery; medical gloves business; restaurant activities; and manufacturing, distribution, and trading of personal protective healthcare equipment, as well as provision of general loans, and micro and corporate financing services. The company was formerly known as Asia Bioenergy Technologies Berhad and changed its name to Fintec Global Berhad in December 2017. Fintec Global Berhad was founded in 2007 is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
